sentences.sContent: He captained the siege of Berlin.
sentences.sCn: 他指挥了围攻柏林的战役。

sentences.sContent: Once you have a flat in central Berlin,you can always monetize it when the prices rise.
sentences.sCn: 如果在柏林市中心有一套公寓，价格上涨时就可以随时把它变现。

sentences.sContent: But I remember an anecdote I once heard from one of my German friends. Shortly after the unification, an Ossie and a Weissie meet in Berlin.
sentences.sCn: 但我记得从一个德国朋友那里听来的这样一件轶事：统一后不久，一个东德人与一个西德人在柏林相遇。
